thread.title: BRIEF-MiX Telematics approves share repurchase programme
thread.title_full: BRIEF-MiX Telematics approves share repurchase programme | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-MiX Telematics approves share repurchase programme
text:
Sept 11 Mix Telematics Ltd :
* Approved a share repurchase programme under which company may repurchase up to 40,000,000 of its ordinary shares (1 600 000 adss) through to March 15, 2016
* Repurchase programme will be funded out of existing cash resources Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom; +44 207 542 1810)
